attributes.action: Allow the royal family to formally give their opinion on Brexit
attributes.additional_details: So, in these difficult times, we should allow the royal family input.
attributes.background: At a time when are government is at a loose end trying to resolve the best outcome for Britain in these challenging circumstances and - perhaps not always following the true will of the people - the royal family represents the true values.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the Royal Family, not the UK Government or Parliament.
